text.title: Search and Find About Someone Using Image Easily

head.s: Search and Find About Someone Using Image Easily

p.s: Have a picture of someone , but do n't know who it is , or what the picture means ?
You can use various image searching tools online to find other copies of the image , track down the origin , and discover more information .
Google Images and TinEye are the most popular options , and you can even do it from your mobile device .

list.item:
Find the image that you want to search with .
You can use Google to search by image instead of text .
Google will attempt to find other copies of the same image on the internet , as well as provide visually similar images .
This can help you determine where the picture originated from , and potentially find more pictures of the same person .
You can search from images that have been saved to your computer , or you can search using the image 's URL .
To find an image 's address , right-click on it and select " Copy image address/URL .
"
To save an image to your computer , right-click on it and select " Save image .
"
If you 're using a mobile device ,
click here instead
.

item.s: Visit the Google Images website .
Visit in your browser .
You 'll see the familiar Google search field .

figure.rend: Search and Find About Someone Using Image Easily Step 2 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Click the Camera button on the right side of the search field .
This will allow you to search by image .

figure.rend: Search and Find About Someone Using Image Easily Step 3 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Add your image that you want to search with .

There are two ways to search by image :
Select " Paste image URL " and paste the copied address into the field .
Select " Upload an image " and browse for the image that you saved to your computer .

Click
" Search by image .

"
A list of search results will be displayed .
If the image was found in other sizes , these will be displayed at the top .
Pages where the same image can be found will be displayed beneath , and visually similar images can be found at the bottom of the first page of results .

figure.rend: Search and Find About Someone Using Image Easily Step 5 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Find the image that you want to search with .
TinEye is a search engine designed to search through images .
You can search using either an image 's URL or by uploading an image file .
While TinEye does not find similar images , you can use it to quickly trace the origin of an image .

figure.rend: Search and Find About Someone Using Image Easily Step 6 Version 2.jpg

item.s: To find an image 's address , right-click on it and select " Copy image address/URL .

list.item:
To save an image to your computer , right-click on it and select " Save image .
"

Visit the TinEye website .
Go to in your web browser .

item.s: Upload your image or paste your copied URL .
Click the Upload button to browse your computer for an image file , or paste the copied image URL into the field .

figure.rend: Search and Find About Someone Using Image Easily Step 8.jpg

item.s: Browse through the search results .
TinyEye will only return results for the same image , so browse through the results to find the origin of the image file .

figure.rend: Search and Find About Someone Using Image Easily Step 9.jpg

item.s: Visit pages with the image to potentially find more information .
The page that contains the image may be able to give you more information as to the person 's identity .
Check out a couple of the results to see if you can learn more about the person in the image . Look for image captions or the paragraph text around the image .

figure.rend: Search and Find About Someone Using Image Easily Step 10.jpg

list.item:
Install the Chrome browser for your device .
You ca n't use the Google Image Search website to search by image on a mobile device , but you can use the Chrome mobile browser to search instead .
You can get Chrome for free from your device 's app store if you do n't have it already .
This method works for both iOS and Android .
You can also use TinEye ( above ) by copying and pasting the URL for the image that you want to search with .
Press and hold an image and select " Copy image address " to copy the URL to your device 's clipboard .
You can then paste this into the TinEye search field .

item.s: Find the picture you want to search with .
You ca n't upload an image , but you can search using any picture you come across online .
Use Chrome to navigate to the image that you want to search with .

figure.rend: Search and Find About Someone Using Image Easily Step 12.jpg

item.s: If you only have an image file on your computer , upload it to an image host like Imgur first and then navigate to it on your mobile device .
Press and hold on the image that you want to search with .
A menu will appear after a moment .

figure.rend: Search and Find About Someone Using Image Easily Step 13.jpg

item.s:
Select
" Search Google for this image .

"
This will perform a Google Image search based off the image you pressed .

figure.rend: Search and Find About Someone Using Image Easily Step 14.jpg

item.s: Browse through the results .
Google will provide its best guess for what the image name is , as well as provide links to pages that its used on .
Visually similar images can be found at the bottom of the first page of results .

figure.rend: Search and Find About Someone Using Image Easily Step 15.jpg

item.s: TinEye is great for checking to see if someone who is claiming an image is an original image of them actually is ! Put in the image details of anyone you know on line , even wikiHow profile pictures , and see how many other times ' their picture ' has been used on line .
